"He [God] calls for an entire change in principles that have come in to divert the minds 
                                                                           8
and draw away the hearts to serve the plans of Satan. . . . May the Lord help and strengthen you and give you clear discernment. While there should be discipline maintained, often the ones who have exacted so close discipline have not had self under control, and oft acted like grown-up children,--pettish, irritable, severe. The rebuke of God has been upon them; but now the Holy Spirit is needed to cure this disease caused by the satanic agencies."
